70050000027222.name: SnowRunner - Anniversary DLC
70050000027222.description:
Celebrate SnowRunner’s first anniversary with the Anniversary DLC and receive two new trucks for free! The CAT 681 and International HX 520 give you all new options for adventuring across the harsh landscapes of SnowRunner, and look good doing it.

The CAT 681 is a robust, all-terrain heavyweight with plenty of storage space and the power to make it across even the harshest of maps. With a sturdy construction it’s less prone to breakage than other trucks.

The International HX 520 can attach to any number of large trailers and is perfect for hauling cargo across the most intense terrain. It joins a fleet of more than 40 others in giving you every option for conquering the wilderness.

70050000027225.name: SnowRunner - Tatra Dual Pack
70050000027225.description:
Expand and bring even more versatility to your SnowRunner fleet with the TATRA Dual Pack, giving you access to the iconic TATRA 813 and TATRA 805!

The TATRA Dual Pack is included for all Year 2 Pass owners.

70050000027228.name: SnowRunner - Season 5: Build & Dispatch
70050000027228.description:
Expand your SnowRunner experience with Season 5: Build & Dispatch. Restore an old TATRA factory in Rostov Oblast, Russia, with two new maps to explore alongside two new TATRA vehicles.

The Season 5: Build & Dispatch DLC is available as part of the Year 2 Pass, or as a standalone purchase.

Season 5: Build & Dispatch includes:
• Two new hill-covered maps in Rostov Oblast, Russia, that you must scavenge to restore a TATRA factory, complete with its signature testing grounds! The surrounding wilderness includes an old nature reserve with dozens of areas to explore.
• Two new TATRA vehicles, that will be unlocked once you restore the vehicle facility: The TATRA FORCE and the TATRA PHOENIX, a pair of modern 8-wheeler powerhouses.

70050000027231.name: SnowRunner - Season 6: Haul & Hustle
70050000027231.description:
The Season 6: Haul & Hustle DLC is included in the Year 2 Pass. Requires the base game SnowRunner to run.

Explore wild new territories in SnowRunner’s Season 6: Haul & Hustle. Conquer two huge maps with two tough new vehicles as you establish a forestry base deep in the cold wilderness of Maine, USA.

The Season 6: Haul & Hustle includes:
• Two new diverse winter maps with both mud and snow in Maine, USA. Plan your routes ahead and upgrade your garage from scratch as you establish your base for forestry.
• Two new vehicles, including the iconic Tayga 6455B and the logging specialist Aramastu Forwarder.

70050000027240.name: SnowRunner - GMC Brigadier
70050000027240.description:
Expand your SnowRunner garage further with the GMC Brigadier DLC, bringing you the brawny GMC Brigadier as well as an exclusive alternate skin. This gas-guzzling juggernaut, upgradable with all-wheel drive and differential lock, will provide extraordinary power and torque to your most daunting missions! 

The GMC Brigadier DLC is not included in the Year 1 Pass or Year 2 Pass.

70050000027243.name: SnowRunner - Burning Bright Vinyl Wrap Pack
70050000027243.description:
Customize your SnowRunner experience further with the Burning Bright Vinyl Wrap Pack, adding four exclusive skins for the Azov 5319, Azov 73210, YAR 87 and Voron AE-4380! 

The Burning Bright Vinyl Wrap Pack is included for all Year 2 Pass owners.

70050000027292.name: MY HERO ONE'S JUSTICE 2 Celebration Wear Set
70050000027292.description:
Players will be able to use Celebration Wear outfits for the following 9 characters: Izuku Midoriya & Shoot Style, Katsuki Bakugo, Ochaco Uraraka, Shoto Todoroki, Eijiro Kirishima, Kyoka Jiro, All Might, and Shota Aizawa.
This pack also includes 10 color variations for each outfit.

Contents:
- Celebration Wear outfits for Izuku Midoriya & Shoot Style, Katsuki Bakugo, Ochaco Uraraka, Shoto Todoroki, Eijiro Kirishima, Kyoka Jiro, All Might, and Shota Aizawa
- 10 outfit Color Variations for each Celebration Wear outfit

70050000027660.name: Sweet Bakery Tycoon Expansion Pack 1
70050000027660.description:
Start serving takeout sweets, using brand new equipment—decorative boxes. Pure sweetness awaits you in this special stages! 

This DLC contains 15 new levels and 7 new achievements.

70050000027661.name: Sweet Bakery Tycoon Expansion Pack 2
70050000027661.description:
Test your skill with the most demanding levels in the game and claim the title of the Dessert King! Delicious cakes, refreshing cocktails, and decorative boxes—this DLC pack has it all!

This DLC contains 15 new levels and 7 new achievements.

70050000028111.name: Arcaea + Misc Pack
70050000028111.intro: A new pack featuring 10 songs, navigators, and avatars from Arcaea!
70050000028111.description:
A DLC pack for GROOVE COASTER WAI WAI PARTY!!!! that includes 10 songs, navigators, and avatars from Arcaea!

This pack includes the following content.
■Song Pack (10 songs)
・Ignotus / ak+q
・Be There / PSYQUI
・Metallic Punisher / INNOCENT NOIZE
・Modelista / HiTECH NINJA
・Singularity / ETIA.
・Corruption / 3R2
・Grievous Lady / Team Grimoire vs Laur
・Black Lotus / wa.
・GOODTEK / EBIMAYO
・???(Secret)

■Navigator
・HIKARI
・TAIRITSU
・SHIRAHIME

■Avatar
・HIKARI(2D)
・TAIRITSU(2D)
・ETO(2D)
・LUNA(2D)
・SHIRAHIME(2D)

*Some content will be unlocked via missions after downloading.

70050000028165.name: Game of Crone
70050000028165.description:
You’ll have to help the escaped prisoners of the Inquisition survive in the wilderness by providing them with everything they need. To develop their camp to a fortified settlement while keeping in mind its benefits. To protect those who entrusted you with their lives, from the sword and fire. And also - to untangle the circumstances of the cruel game, which turned into the Great Blast and the return of the Ancient Curse.
• 6-12 hours of extra gameplay
• Build your own refugee camp
• Stop a vampire terrorizing the Village
• Help Donkey lead the Revolution
• Unravel the secrets of your friends
• Get access to brand new bag mechanics
• New dishes, gravestones, fences
• New teleportation scrolls

70050000028386.name: The Clockwork Expansion
70050000028386.intro: Four automated factions and co-operative play!
70050000028386.description:
Tick...tock...tick...tock...

The battle for the wild wood kicks into gear with the Clockwork Expansion!

Four fiendishly automated enemy factions bring new challenges to Root in a customizable alternative to the game's AI! Can you overcome the mechanical menace and secure your right to rule the forest?

Introduces Co-op Play! Team up to take on powerful automated opponents!

Mechanical Marquise 2.0
This is the simplest of the bots and can be used to fill out the player count in dozens of configurations. Though this bot is straightforward, don’t get complacent. At least one player will need to keep it in check!

Electrical Eyrie
The Electric Eyrie will inspire fear in the most stalwart of players. Like the Eyrie Dynasties, this bot can ramp up its action potential aggressively.

Automated Alliance
The Automated Alliance is especially zealous and will revolt frequently. Keep in mind their potential targets so you avoid any unpleasant surprises. Once they do establish a foothold, timing is critical. Don’t let them consolidate their warriors or you’ll be in trouble!

Vagabot
The Vagabot makes for a capricious friend or foe. Like a human player, he will reward those who craft items. But be careful, he can make for a dangerous enemy once he gets enough items to boost his maximum hits.

70050000028466.name: The Riverfolk Expansion
70050000028466.intro: The Riverfolk arrive in Root! Two new factions join the fray!
70050000028466.description:
Two new factions and Vagabond variants bring new challenges to Root! 

Riverfolk Company
The Riverfolk Company is open for business – the woodland may be at war, but there's no reason you can't make a profit! Establish trade posts and earn your victory! 

Lizard Cult
Spread the scaly gospel of the Lizard Cult! Tend your gardens to radicalize new acolytes, and reveal the true extent of your proselytizing power! 

New Vagabond Variants!
Three new Vagabonds skulk into the woodland to help you swindle your way to victory! The Scoundrel torches the woodland rather than see others rule it; the Vagrant starts fights that others have to finish; and the Arbiter offers their services...for a price, of course! 

New Challenges!
New single-player scenarios and tutorials help you learn the wily ways of the latest woodland warriors!

70050000028626.name: HOT WHEELS™ - DC Super-Villains Racing Season
70050000028626.description:
This season will be playable until: 18 January 2022.
 
The HOT WHEELS™ - DC Super-Villains Racing Season will be available for purchase until:

CET: 13 January 2022 at 6pm
ET: 13 January 2022 at 12pm
PT: 13 January 2022 at 9am

This DLC is not included in any HOT WHEELS™ Pass

This season may be dedicated to the Bad Guys, but it's filled with good news! HOT WHEELS™ - DC Super-Villains Racing Season is now available! 

This DLC allows you to unlock all the premium items of the season and immediately get a fantastic reward: Deathstroke™! Make your way through thrilling levels and complete exciting challenges to get vehicles and exclusive customisations inspired by DC Comics’ most ruthless villains! Conquer the abnormal strength of Bane, the razor-sharp claws of The Cheetah™, the toxic charm of Poison Ivy™, the stamina of Black Manta™ and the killer-instinct of Deathstroke™. Oh, and you'll go crazy for Harley Quinn™ too! 
Includes 15 new unlockable elements for your Unleashed Profile and for your Basement! These rewards are pretty good, even for the Bad Guys Season!

With this DLC you get access to 21 premium items:

- 6 vehicles: Bane, The Cheetah™, Poison Ivy™, Black Manta™, Deathstroke™, Harley Quinn™
- 12 elements for your Basement: 3 walls, 2 floors, 2 doors, 2 decorations, 2 posters, 1 set of 4 posters
- 3 elements for your Unleashed Profile: 1 icon, 1 tag, 1 background

70050000028627.name: HOT WHEELS™ - Street Fighter Blanka
70050000028627.description:
Unleash the brute force of this car inspired by Blanka, the world-famous character from Street Fighter. Just like Blanka, this VW Baja Bug has undergone a wild upgrade that makes it a real nightmare for any opponent. Bright green like the skin of Blanka, and with his (or should we say its?) signature vivid orange hair, this car is ready to make its way through the jungle… er, the track brawling for the first position! 

Blanka will strike you with electric performance leaving anyone behind in total shock! Overtake your rivals ferociously with predatorial rage! Follow your animal instinct and add it to your collection now!

This DLC is included in the HOT WHEELS™ Pass Vol. 1

70050000028628.name: HOT WHEELS™ - Wonder Woman™
70050000028628.description:
Lasso the competition and dominate the race like a real Amazon! Here is a super aerodynamic speedster inspired by one of the most beloved DC Comics characters ever: Wonder Woman™! 
Its beautiful livery echoes the colors and design of her legendary costume, with the golden star-tiara on the roof and the iconic double W on the hood.

And what about performance? Well, we know that the Amazons were excellent horse riders, but here we are talking about tons of horsepower: push down on the gas pedal and earn your place among the gods of the race. It's no wonder you can't wait to drive it!

This DLC is included in the HOT WHEELS™ Pass Vol. 1

70050000028629.name: HOT WHEELS™ - AcceleRacers Deora™ II
70050000028629.description:
Put yourself in the shoes (or more likely beach sandals) of Vert Wheeler and hop in this fabulous masterpiece on four wheels! Straight from the cult movie Highway 35 World Race, here is the legendary Deora™ II with the Wave Rippers livery. An evolution of the original 1968 Deora model, this racing car seems to be made for surfing the track with its two boards in the rear bed! 

Deora™ II will take you straight to the highest step of the podium to prove once again who is the World’s Best Driver. Get on board, ride the wave of success and… Hang Loose bro!

This DLC is included in the HOT WHEELS™ Pass Vol. 1

70050000028630.name: HOT WHEELS™ - TMNT Leonardo
70050000028630.description:
COWABUNGA! If you are looking for a masterpiece on four-wheels you have come to the right place: straight from the world of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles, here is the racing car inspired by Leonardo! With its green body, blue mask and the legendary double katana as the rear spoiler, HOT WHEELS™ - TMNT Leonardo will take you from the sewers to the top of the podium. 

Master the art of overtaking, draw phenomenal trajectories and shred the competition like a real warrior. We are pretty sure you've never seen a turtle this fast. Complete your collection now!

This DLC is included in the HOT WHEELS™ Pass Vol. 1

70050000028631.name: HOT WHEELS™ - Thanksgiving Pack
70050000028631.description:
It’s time to say thank you, 3 times, with this free Thanksgiving pack, featuring 3 new vehicles for your collection... and they will not go unnoticed! Hot Seat™ is… well, that’s what we call a WC: a Wild Car. This toilet-on-wheels will be your number 1 - or sometimes number 2 - choice to flush the competition away. Because when you gotta go, you gotta go… right on top of the podium! 

And when the race turns into a Death Match, bury your rivals with Rigor Motor™! A die-hard racing coffin with an exposed engine and a bat, perfect to find out if there is life after… the finish line. Driving this powerful car will be a hell of a ride! 

Last but not least (and never last on the track) BMW 3.0 CSL Racing: even if the L in its name refers to the lightness of its body, when it comes to racing and beating its opponents this car has a lead foot!

Download the special HOT WHEELS™ - Thanksgiving Pack now! 

This DLC includes 3 vehicles: 
- Hot Seat™ 
- Rigor Motor™ 
- BMW 3.0 CSL Racing

70050000028868.name: HOT WHEELS™ - Pink Fashion Customization Pack
70050000028868.description:
If your rivals made you see red, after the race you might want to get some relaxation surrounded by more soothing shades of pink! So here is the perfect pack for you: 8 elements in the tones of pink to customize your Basement with fancy decorations and that fashion touch that will charm everyone. Even your toughest opponents! As they will be distracted by your Interior Designer skills, you can overtake them without mercy! Talk about Fashion Victims! So the prettier your Basement is, the better it is for your chances of winning! 

Also, this exclusive pack features 3 exclusive elements for your Unleashed Profile, with a dedicated icon, tag and background! Show off your style, not just in the race! 

This DLC includes: 

For the Basement: 
- 2 walls
- 2 floors 
- 1 door
- 1 decoration
- 1 couch
- 1 set of 4 posters

For the Unleashed Profile: 
- 1 icon
- 1 tag
- 1 background

This DLC is included in the HOT WHEELS™ Pass Vol. 1

70050000028869.name: HOT WHEELS™ - Batman Expansion
70050000028869.description:
Batman™ fans -one and all- certainly can't miss this expansion dedicated to the Dark Knight, which puts you among the most famous criminals and heroes of Gotham City. Choose your side: The Joker™ GT and The Penguin are ready to hit the track, and they are up to no good. They will have to face the power of vehicles like Armored Batman™, Batman™ Rebirth and Robin™ 2.0T, who are ready to do battle with anyone who stands in between them and justice… or in this case, the finish line. A fantastic new environment is waiting for you to race and build tracks worthy of this epic challenge between good and evil, with a new themed module! Explore the secrets of the Batcave, through hi-tech devices, rocks and of course... the Batmobile! Plus, new customization items inspired by the world of Batman™ for your Basement and your Unleashed Profile!

This DLC contains:
- 1 Environment to race and build your tracks: Batcave
- 5 Vehicles: The Joker™ GT, The Penguin, Batman™ Rebirth, Robin™ 2.0T, Armored Batman™
- 1 Themed Customization Pack containing for the Basement: 3 walls, 2 floors, 1 door, 2 decorations, 1 sofa, 1 poster and 1 set of 4 posters; for the Unleashed Profile: 2 icons, 2 tags and 2 backgrounds
- 1 Track Builder Module

This DLC is included in the HOT WHEELS™ Pass Vol. 1

70050000028870.name: HOT WHEELS™ - AcceleRacers Bassline™
70050000028870.description:
Make some noise for the arrival of this new racing car straight from the futuristic world of AcceleRacers! Driven by Shirako Takamoto and the only truck in the acclaimed series, Bassline™ is ready to make you feel (and hear!) all the thrills of victory thanks to its huge rear speakers and subwoofers: the perfect soundtrack… for your tracks! And whoever tries to stop you, will have to face the music! So get ready to step on the podium, also thanks to another kind of sound: those sweet notes of its powerful V10 engine. 

This vehicle cannot be missing in your collection, so turn up the volume and make your opponents tremble with HOT WHEELS™ - AcceleRacers Bassline™!

This DLC is included in the HOT WHEELS™ Pass Vol. 1

70050000028871.name: HOT WHEELS™ - Dinopult Module
70050000028871.description:
Here is a new interactive module that will make your track go down in history. Well, actually... pre-history! Add HOT WHEELS™ - Dinopult Module to any track and get ready to jump into the Jurassic Era with this huge red stegosaurus. 

Race under its belly, between its massive legs, but be careful not to get caught by its unpredictable tail: pass through at the wrong time and you will be thrown into the air losing the lead of the race! And this could mean extinction for your hope of victory! Learn how to use it to your advantage to beat your rivals and you might find yourself landing on the podium!

This DLC is included in the HOT WHEELS™ Pass Vol. 1

70050000028872.name: HOT WHEELS™ - Barbie™ Dream Camper™
70050000028872.description:
Don't be fooled by its appearance: the Barbie™ Dream Camper™ isn't your classic Sunday driver vehicle. Born for the outdoors, this compact and multifunctional RV will surprise you even on the longest indoor races. And if someone needs a vacation, it will be your rivals, after you overtake them on the finish line! 

On the other hand, the convenience of having a camper is that you can park it anywhere you want... especially on the top step of the podium. With Barbie™ Dream Camper™ your dreams of glory will finally come true! 

This DLC is included in the HOT WHEELS™ Pass Vol. 1

70050000028873.name: HOT WHEELS™ - Christmas Pack
70050000028873.description:
At Christmas, it's the thought that counts… so think how awesome it would be to add 3 new cool vehicles to your collection. Wish granted! HOT WHEELS™ - Christmas Pack is our gift for you! 

Let's start with Rockin' Santa Sled: the racing version of Santa's sleigh who for once will abandon his reindeers for a few hundred horsepower. With this car he could deliver gifts in half an hour! 

And then there's Bazoomka™, a small compact jet with a huge front propeller and rear thrusters: it just flew away from an amusement park to land on your tracks. 

And to top it off, one of the most desired cars by all AcceleRacers fans: Synkro™. With its huge rear wing, exposed engine and its racing set-up, it's really a gifted contender for the championship!

This DLC includes 3 vehicles: 
- Rockin' Santa Sled
- Bazoomka™
- Synkro™

70050000028874.name: HOT WHEELS™ - 2-Tuff™
70050000028874.description:
What's in a name? A lot actually. The personality of 2-Tuff™ is all written in its name. Too tough for your opponents to even think about defeating it, and too wicked awesome to go unnoticed. This beautiful muscle-packed pick-up truck lives up to the hype. 

And now, get ready to explore the meaning of another word: victory! Despite its massive size, the powerful V8 engine and sturdy body sculpted with aerodynamic details will make you fly straight to the finish line. Add 2-Tuff™ to your collection with the exclusive Highway Patrol livery and your opponents will be sentenced to defeat.

70050000028875.name: HOT WHEELS™ - SpongeBob Racing Season
70050000028875.description:
This season will be playable until: March 29, 2022.

The HOT WHEELS™ - SpongeBob Racing Season will be available for purchase until:

CET: March 24, 2022 at 6 pm
ET: March 24, 2022 at 1 pm
PT: March 24, 2022 at 10 am

Are you ready for an ocean of F.U.N.? The HOT WHEELS™ - SpongeBob Racing Season is here! Dive into the Pacific for exciting new challenges that will be anything but peaceful. 

This DLC allows you to unlock all the premium items of the season and instantly add all the energy of Sandy Cheeks to your collection! But don’t miss all the other exclusive vehicles inspired by the characters of the series that you’ll get by winning the new challenges of this season: the greedy Mr. Krabs, the grumpy Squidward, the legendary SpongeBob, and Patrick who, for once, will prove to be super agile and fast! 
And for your Unleashed profile and your Basement, an all (sub)marine look with 15 new unlockable items! A sea of new content awaits you!

With this DLC you get access to 20 premium items:

- 5 vehicles: Sandy Cheeks, Mr. Krabs, Patrick, Squidward, SpongeBob SquarePants.
- 12 elements for your Basement: 3 walls, 2 floors, 2 doors, 2   decorations, 2 posters, 1 set of 4 posters
- 3 elements for your Unleashed Profile: 1 icon, 1 tag, 1 background

This DLC is not included in any HOT WHEELS™ Pass

70050000028876.name: HOT WHEELS™ - TMNT Michelangelo
70050000028876.description:
COWABUNGA! Here is another car straight from the world of Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles, inspired by Michelangelo himself! With its green body, orange mask and a legendary nunchuks rear wing, it will help you carve your name in history. 

Get ready for super fun races: with HOT WHEELS™ - TMNT Michelangelo, overtaking your opponents will be a joke! And even if he is known as the life of the pizza party, when it comes to racing Michelangelo is certainly a serious contender. 

Add this awesome vehicle to your collection and don't miss all the vehicles inspired by your favorite series!

This DLC is included in the HOT WHEELS™ Pass Vol. 2

70050000028877.name: HOT WHEELS™ - AcceleRacers Power Rage™
70050000028877.description:
Welcome to the realm where speed reigns supreme. One of Vert Wheeler's most wanted cars can finally be yours! 

From the acclaimed animated series AcceleRacers, Power Rage™, the car that replaced Deora II™ when it was destroyed, will take you at full speed to the realm... of victories! Featuring neon lights to race even in the dark with unmistakable style, and a huge rear wing to keep you glued to the track while still ready to fly across the finish line. 

Unleash the fury of 410 horsepower and tame this racing beast! Add Power Rage™ to your collection now!

This DLC is included in the HOT WHEELS™ Pass Vol. 2

70050000028878.name: HOT WHEELS™ - Street Fighter Chun-Li
70050000028878.description:
As beautiful and powerful as the Street Fighter character she is inspired by, Chun-Li is ready to make her way onto the track with her agility. She is M. Bison's sworn enemy, but she will have no mercy on any rival! 

The car's appearance recalls the traditional Chinese dress worn by Chun-Li, with a blue body and golden details while the sides feature the iconic double buns that made her hairstyle famous. 
Chun-Li in Chinese means "Beautiful Spring" and for you it means that a wonderful season... of races is about to start! Add it to your collection, it's definitely the winning move!

This DLC is included in the HOT WHEELS™ Pass Vol. 2

70050000028879.name: HOT WHEELS™ - Mattel Dream Mobile™
70050000028879.description:
The futuristic look of this car seems to come straight out of a '50s sci-fi movie… but more than the future, this stunning design tells us about a piece of history. Mattel Dream Mobile™ was the first toy car created by Mattel™ in 1953, when Hot Wheels™ was still just a dream. 

A wonderful tribute to the past and to the vision of tomorrow, this splendid bubble-topped convertible looks ready to take off or teleport directly to the finish line. The future of your opponents is filled with broken dreams! Wake up and add it to your collection now!

70050000028880.name: HOT WHEELS™ - Street Fighter Vega
70050000028880.description:
Beauty is its strength! Obviously, we are talking about Vega's vehicle that, just like the Spanish Ninja who inspired it, makes aesthetic perfection its secret weapon. 
It's a racing car with an aerodynamic design that recalls a Formula 1 with an aggressive double front wing, characterized by the famous white mask of Vega and its formidable claws on the side.

Vanity might even be a sin, but how not to brag about all the victories that HOT WHEELS™ - Street Fighter Vega will bring you? Watch your opponents surrender and cross the finish line… Have you ever seen anything more beautiful?

This DLC is included in the HOT WHEELS™ Pass Vol. 2

70050000028881.name: HOT WHEELS™ - Corvette Stingray Convertible 2014
70050000028881.description:
When you own a car like this one you know you've really arrived. Most likely, right on the top step of the podium. Obviously, we are talking about Corvette Stingray Convertible 2014, a sports car with an unmistakable design. 

But this jewel on four wheels is not just aesthetics and appearances: this Corvette is as beautiful as it is fast. Engineered for the road, on the track it will unleash the full power of its V8 engine and its 450 hp, leaving all its opponents behind. 
Feel cool with the hottest car around and cross the finish line with Corvette Stingray Convertible 2014. Add it to your collection now!

This DLC is included in the HOT WHEELS™ Pass Vol. 2

70050000028882.name: HOT WHEELS™ - McLaren Senna
70050000028882.description:
The legend of Ayrton Senna lives on in this jewel of design and speed. A faithful replica of the real sports car created by the British automotive brand, McLaren Senna combines the DNA of the Formula 1 team with the monumental class of the immortal Brazilian 3-time world champion, together in a masterpiece that creates the purest connection between car and driver. 

Launch this coupe down the straight and prepare to be amazed. Pass everyone and get to Senna's favorite place: the top step of the podium. And at the same speed, add it to your collection!

This DLC is included in the HOT WHEELS™ Pass Vol. 2

70050000028885.name: HOT WHEELS™ - Monster Trucks Expansion
70050000028885.description: Take racing to a new dimension... EXTRA LARGE! Everything is oversized in this expansion: wheels, vehicles, jumps and even the fun! It's time to go BIG with a new environment, customization items and themed vehicles!

70050000028886.name: HOT WHEELS™ - Street Fighter Ryu
70050000028886.description:
In the collection inspired by the world of Street Fighter (and in your personal one), this amazing roadster dedicated to Ryu, the most beloved character of the series, shouldn't go missing. Total white like his combat uniform and the purity of his soul, and with his iconic headband, red like the warrior spirit that burns inside him, this is the perfect car to hit your rivals with your racing skills. 

Follow Ryu's teachings and be as fast as the wind, as silent as a forest, as intense as fire and you will be as immovable (from the podium) as a mountain. Unleash the energy of HOT WHEELS™ - Street Fighter Ryu!

This DLC is included in the HOT WHEELS™ Pass Vol. 2

70050000028887.name: HOT WHEELS™ - TMNT Raphael
70050000028887.description:
COWABUNGA! A new vehicle to add to your Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles collection! This Raphael-inspired van inherits all the qualities of the character from the comics: great fighter, the spirit of leader and… a hot head. Have you ever seen a Turtle going ape? So don't get in its way or it might lose its temper... but TMNT Raphael will never lose a battle! 

With its green body, the iconic red bandana and a pair of sai as side spoilers, it will do everything to be the leader of the race and bring you memorable victories. If your racing ego has no limits, this car is the perfect fit for you. Add HOT WHEELS™ - TMNT Raphael to your collection and don't miss all the vehicles inspired by your favorite series!

This DLC is included in the HOT WHEELS™ Pass Vol. 2

70050000028888.name: HOT WHEELS™ - AcceleRacers Hollowback™
70050000028888.description:
Metal Maniacs rejoice! Tork Maddox's legendary car joins the fray, a muscle car super modified to resist everything and everyone. And that's what makes it so irresistible! 

Not surprisingly Hollowback™ is one of the few cars in the acclaimed series (and the only one of the Metal Maniacs) that has never been damaged or destroyed. And how could it be? I mean, did you have a good look at it? This racing car is made of pure solidity and, with its V8 engine, it will make its way through all the opponents on its path, leaving a void behind (staying true to its name). 
A must-have for all AcceleRacers fans that should be present in every collection!

This DLC is included in the HOT WHEELS™ Pass Vol. 2

70050000028935.name: Doom & Destiny Worlds - Fantastic Quests and Where to Find Them
70050000028935.intro: Unlock rare and powerful items by helping who is in need. This is the way of the hero. Nothing is done for free!
70050000028935.description:
THE WORLD CAN WAIT! YOU HAVE SIDE-QUESTS TO COMPLETE!
Saving the world is a hassle, especially if you’re doing it for free!
Take a break and help random strangers for some epic loot!

THIS IS THE HERO’S WAY!
Unlock preposterous costumes, magic-infused rings, loud resource-gathering machinery and monster farms. All you need to do is help four weird strangers.

Follow the oracle's premonitions and help her solve her financial problems.
Find the cursed Jewelers and soothe their pain furnishing their house.
Piece together the shattered memory of the famous Geologist and unravel his past!

“FANTASTIC QUESTS AND WHERE TO FIND THEM” FEATURES:
- 6 new armors,
- 10 new helms,
- 5 new utility items,
- 3 new weapons,
- 19 new magic rings,
- 13 new machineries capable to automatically gather resources,
- 10 monster spawners, to summon and fight monsters whenever you want,
- 3 brand new islands.

70050000028936.name: Doom & Destiny Worlds - Survival of the Nerdiest
70050000028936.intro: Can four nerds survive without WIFI? Survival of the Nerdiest features the "Survival mode", which will challenge you with new game-play mechanics like hunger, thirst, and sleep!
70050000028936.description:
ARE YOU NERD ENOUGH TO SURVIVE?

Survival of the Nerdiest, the first premium DLC for Doom & Destiny Worlds, is a brand new game mode for the original game that introduces new game mechanics for a completely new gaming experience! 

Start a NEW GAME and face hunger, thirst, sleep, hot and cold weather. You need to gather food and water if you don't want to become food yourself for the many creatures that dwells on the worlds of Halargian!

SURVIVAL OF THE NERDIEST FEATURES:
- HUNGER and THIRST mechanic: find food and water to avoid starvation and dehydration;
- UNIQUE cooking RECIPES:  special "feast" will grants the whole party powerful bonuses in battle!
- SLEEP mechanics: you need to rest or your party will be tired and weak. Resting comfortable will grand you bonus;
- HOT and COLD mechanic: if not dressed properly, the islands temperature will affects your stats.
- NEW MONSTERS dwell the three worlds of Halargian. Hunt them down to gather unique resources;
- BREED animals to have constant supply of food or company.

Are you nerd enough for the challenge?

70050000029029.name: Burger Chef Tycoon Expansion Pack #1
70050000029029.description:
Fried meat, fresh veggies and crispy bun make a delicious burger. Unlock new levels and serve more deliciousness in this content update!

In this expansion pack you will find:
-20 new levels,
-6 new achievements

70050000029030.name: Doom & Destiny Worlds - Deluxe Content
70050000029030.intro: 6 unique BLUEPRINTS to craft classy headgears and an armor!
70050000029030.description:
**This content is featured in the "Ultimate Supporter Edition" BUNDLE**

Do&De Worlds DELUXE CONTENT features 6 unique BLUEPRINTS to craft classy headgears and an armor (use the Anvil and the Spinning Wheel to craft them).

This DLC is a way to show us your love and support for the Doom & Destiny series!

All the nerds at Heartbit Interactive and even the Flying Spaghetti Monster itself thanks you from the bottom of their heart..bits.
Happy gaming.

70050000029031.name: Burger Chef Tycoon Expansion Pack #2
70050000029031.description:
Are you hungry for more? Challenge awaits in this expansion pack! Make the best burgers in town and better be fast!

In this expansion pack you will find:
-20 new levels,
-6 new achievements

70050000029037.name: Doom & Destiny Worlds - Seven Seas of Halargian
70050000029037.intro: Rogue-like based expansion, still in development.
70050000029037.description: Seven Seas of Halargian - Are you nerd enough to sail through the seven seas and uncover forbidden trinkets and powers?

70050000029235.name: Assassin's Creed II - Audio Package (French, Spanish, German, Italian, Russian, Japanese)
70050000029235.description: Assassin's Creed II Audio Pack enables additional language support for the game. Package including audio dubbing.

70050000029239.name: Assassin’s Creed Embers
70050000029239.description: Embers is Ezio Auditore’s final chapter in a story that has spanned more than four decades. Now living in a cozy Tuscan villa with his wife, Sofia, and their two children, Ezio spends his time enjoying the company of family and old friends, and cultivating his vineyards. These are day of quiet comfort. But the life of this former Assassin Mentor will not stay quiet for long. One day a mysterious Assassin shows up at Ezio’s door quiet unexpectedly, bearing terrible news from the East and begging for Ezio’s aid. Ezio refuses at first, but when the lives of his family are threatened by the men following his guest, he has no choice but to act. Will this old assassin’s fire die out before he can save the ones he love, or will it burn brightly one last time, and spark a flame in a new generation of Assassins?

70050000029243.name: Assassin’s Creed Lineage
70050000029243.description: Explore the events that revolve around Ezio’s father, Giovanni Auditore da Firenze, and gain insight on the Assassin’s Creed story and universe.

70050000029247.name: Assassin's Creed Revelations
70050000029247.description:
In Assassin’s Creed Revelations, master assassin Ezio Auditore walks in the footsteps of the legendary mentor Altair, on a journey of discovery and revelation. It is a perilous path – one that will take Ezio to Constantinople, the heart of the Ottoman Empire, where a growing army of Templars threatens to destabilize the region.

BECOME DEADLIER THAN EVER
Wield the lethal skills of a wiser, more efficient and deadlier Ezio. Swiftly eliminate your adversaries by deploying a new arsenal of weapons and abilities, such as enhanced free-running and hook blade combat. Experience new levels of gameplay customization with bomb crafting, and use heightened Eagle Vision to overcome your enemies and the environment.

EXPERIENCE REVOLUTIONARY GAMEPLAY
Explore the farthest reaches of the Animus as you uncover the mysteries of Desmond’s past while gaining insight into what the future might hold.

70050000029251.name: Assassin's Creed Brotherhood
70050000029251.description:
Defeating the corrupt tyrants entrenched there will require not only strength, but leadership, as Ezio commands an entire Brotherhood who will rally to his side. Only by working together can the Assassins defeat their mortal enemies.

It’s time to join the Brotherhood.

BE A LEGEND
Take Ezio, now a legendary Assassin, on a new adventure with 15+ hours of story-driven single-player gameplay.

LEAD AND CONTROL A LEGENDARY BROTHERHOOD
Recruit and customize your own guild. Train and level up assassins and command them to aid you in your quest.

DEPLOY SECRET WEAPONS
Swiftly eliminate your enemies using tools such as poison darts, parachutes, double hidden blades, hidden guns, and an advanced flying machine at your disposal.

WIN THE HEART OF A CITY 
Use your hard-won currency to revitalize the crumbling capitol city. Rally the citizens to your cause and unlock extra factions and missions.

70050000029307.name: Original Pack 4 (10th Anniversary)
70050000029307.intro: 10 original songs, including Grated songs composed by Tatsh and COSIO are now available! With navigators and avatars!
70050000029307.description:
A DLC pack for GROOVE COASTER WAI WAI PARTY!!!! that includes 10 songs, navigators, and avatars!

This pack includes the following content.

■Song Pack (10 songs)
・1llusion 0f the FAIRYtALE hARMONY / LINKA (CV: Moe Toyota)・YUME (CV: Nanami Takahashi)・SEINE (CV: Eriko Kawakami)
・Play merrily NEO / Shohei Tsuchiya (ZUNTATA) feat. Aimee B
・Invader OnDo / COSIO
・Seija no Kigan / Tatsh
・DX Choyasei! Survival Zundoko Chan / IOSYS TRAX with Chiyoko
・koinegau / technoplanet feat. Shun [RIGEL]
・Valkyrja Requiem / iTIC
・COSMOSTART / D-D-Dice
・Happy 10th anniversary / Shohei Tsuchiya(ZUNTATA) feat. Huddleston Gary Scott

・Yume (Fairy) *with voice
・Seine (Fairy) *with voice
・Full Metal Zundoko Chan *with voice
・Survival Zundoko Chan *with voice

■Avatar

・YUME(Fairy, 2D)
・SEINE(Fairy, 2D)
・Survival Zundoko Chan(2D)

*Some content will be unlocked via missions after downloading.

70050000029424.name: HOT WHEELS™ - Holiday Season Customization Pack
70050000029424.description:
To really put yourself in full festive mood, there's nothing better than this special Holiday Season Customization Pack! Make your Basement and your Unleashed profile unique with 8 fantastic elements to decorate walls, floors, doors and give a Christmas touch to the room with decorations, sofa and themed posters included! And for your Unleashed profile, an icon, tag and dedicated background will take you to the heart of the celebrations.

But even if it's Christmas time, your rivals can expect no gifts from you! So get ready to beat them mercilessly even during the holidays on the tracks created in your new Christmassy Basement and unpack victory after victory.

This DLC contains:

For the Basement: 
- 2 walls
- 2 floors
- 1 door
- 1 decoration
- 1 couch
- 1 set of 4 posters

For the Unleashed Profile: 
- 1 icon
- 1 tag
- 1 background

This DLC is included in the HOT WHEELS™ Pass Vol. 1

70050000029425.name: HOT WHEELS™ - Spinning Tire Module
70050000029425.description:
The wheel of fortune is always spinning… but to overcome this obstacle on the track you will need much more than just luck: class, speed and lightning-fast reflexes will be your secret weapons! Add Spinning Tire Module to your track and test your timing with this giant tire that rotates around the track – choose the right moment to avoid its unstoppable spinning bar or you'll be blown away without mercy! There's no getting around it: this module can really decide the fate of the competition.

With HOT WHEELS™ - Spinning Tire Module… freewheeling fun is guaranteed!

This DLC is included in the HOT WHEELS™ Pass Vol. 1

70050000029610.name: HOT WHEELS™ - Outer Space Customization Pack
70050000029610.description:
Wanna give a stellar new look to your Basement? Then get ready to make some space - literally! - for the special HOT WHEELS™ - Outer Space Customization Pack. 8 cosmic elements to decorate walls, floors, doors and transform your Basement into the center of the universe... of racing! With decorations, couch and themed posters included! And for your Unleashed Profile, a dedicated icon, tag and background will transform you into a real astronaut ready to defy gravity. 

Fly your racing cars to the top of the podium and get ready for galactic victories, because becoming a star of the races has never been easier!

This DLC contains:

For the Basement:
- 2 walls
- 2 floors
- 1 door
- 1 decoration
- 1 couch
- 1 set of 4 posters

For the Unleashed Profile: 
- 1 icon
- 1 tag
- 1 background

This DLC is included in the HOT WHEELS™ Pass Vol. 2

70050000029611.name: HOT WHEELS™ - Booster Slam Module
70050000029611.description:
Slam dunk like a basketball pro and enjoy an incredible infinite boost! 

Add the animated Booster Slam module to your track and try to jump straight into its moving hoop. Forget the 3 points: if you’ll manage to perfectly calibrate speed and angle, you will immediately get an unlimited, continuous boost that could change the fate of the competition! And even in case of respawn the boost will still be yours. It's an assist that could take you directly to the top step of the podium and turn you into the MVP of the race! No time-outs, add HOT WHEELS™ - Booster Slam Module to your track now!

This DLC is included in the HOT WHEELS™ Pass Vol. 2

70050000029612.name: HOT WHEELS™ - Skaters Customization Pack
70050000029612.description:
Jumps, ramps and tricks are the elements that will turn your Basement into a real Skaters’ Paradise! Whether you can barely complete an Ollie or are able to land a 900 like a pro, everyone deserves a Basement that shows your pure passion for skateboarding! 

With the special HOT WHEELS™ - Skaters Customization Pack, you will get 8 super cool elements to decorate walls, floors and doors. With couch and themed posters included! Customize your Unleashed Profile with a dedicated icon, tag and background and hit the track with your passion for tricks in breathtaking races, challenging your opponents in your own temple of skate!

This DLC contains:

For the Basement: 
- 2 walls
- 2 floors
- 1 door
- 1 decoration
- 1 couch
- 1 set of 4 posters

For the Unleashed Profile: 
- 1 icon
- 1 tag
- 1 background

This DLC is included in the HOT WHEELS™ Pass Vol. 2

70050000029613.name: HOT WHEELS™ - Gorilla Garage Module
70050000029613.description:
There's definitely some monkey business going on here! The new Gorilla Garage module is ready to bring the challenge to a whole new level of craziness! 

This furious giant just can't stand those who leave the doors open and with noises, huffs and puffs - and big punches - is ready to fix the situation. So be careful when he raises his powerful arms, because right after he will hit the garage, closing the doors and blocking the passage! Timing and quick reflexes will be your winning weapons to tame his unstoppable fury. 

Add some wild fun to your track with HOT WHEELS™ - Gorilla Garage Module!

This DLC is included in the HOT WHEELS™ Pass Vol. 2

70050000029614.name: HOT WHEELS™ - Haunted Customization Pack
70050000029614.description:
Give your Basement a spooky new look! The new Haunted Customization Pack has everything you need to customize your walls, doors, floor, sofa and boo-tiful themed decorations! With a Basement full of cobwebs, skulls and bats, it's not just your talent that your opponents should be afraid of! And of course, we have also thought about your Unleashed Profile: dedicated icon, tag and background to tell everyone that you are a real racing monster! 

Don't miss the Haunted Customization Pack and (trick or) treat yo' self with all these scary new items!

This DLC includes: 

For the Basement: 
- 2 walls
- 2 floors 
- 1 door
- 1 decoration
- 1 sofa
- 1 set of 4 posters

For the Unleashed Profile: 
- 1 icon
- 1 tag
- 1 background

This DLC is included in the HOT WHEELS™ Pass Vol. 2

70050000029615.name: HOT WHEELS™ - Shark Jaws Module
70050000029615.description:
You’re gonna need a bigger boost! The terrifying jaws of this giant shark are ready to panic even the most experienced drivers and tear their hopes of victory to shreds. 

To be a fish out of water, Shark Jaws is definitely at ease in the role of the hungry predator and will not miss a delicious snack made of plastic and metal: your car! Watch out for when it raises its sharp teeth, because after a few moments its mouth will close, sweeping away tracks and cars. Use your booster to break and escape its relentless teeth! 

Add the Shark Jaws module and make your track even more jaw-some!

This DLC is included in the HOT WHEELS™ Pass Vol. 2

70050000029616.name: HOT WHEELS™ - Multipack
70050000029616.description:
IMPORTANT NOTICE

This product is not available for purchase: it is exclusively included in HOT WHEELS™ - Ultimate Stunt Edition.
The products included in this DLC can be purchased separately.
HOT WHEELS™ - Multipack includes:
- HOT WHEELS™ - Haunted Customization Pack
- HOT WHEELS™ - Street Fighter Ryu
- HOT WHEELS™ - Shark Jaws Module
- HOT WHEELS™ - TMNT Raphael
- HOT WHEELS™ - AcceleRacers Hollowback™

This pack also includes 10 color variations for Hitoshi Shinso's costume.

- 10 Costume Color Variations

70050000029948.name: Ryza's Outfit - Special Costume for Ao
70050000029948.intro: Say goodbye to an ordinary life. A certain character's outfit can be found here!
70050000029948.description:
"Ryza's Outfit", a costume for Ao based on the outfit of Reisalin Stout, the main character from "Atelier Ryza 2: Lost Legends & the Secret Fairy", is added.

Note: After unlocking the Change Outfit function for the poolside "Locker Room", you can change into the costume from the lockers inside the "Locker Room".
Note: This content might be purchasable in the future.
Note: For details about content, please visit the official site.

70050000030076.name: Dead Cells: The Queen and the Sea
70050000030076.intro: Fight through two new levels and a boss to try and finally get off this cursed island. This is late-game content that finishes the path started with The Bad Seed and Fatal Falls DLCs.
70050000030076.description:
Battle your way through sunken shipwrecks, scale a burning lighthouse and confront your deadliest foe yet. If you manage to make it through all that, maybe you’ll finally get off this god-forsaken island...
This late-game content gives you an alternative to the High Peak Castle, Derelict Distillery and Throne Room biomes. 

Infested Shipwreck: Fight through the claustrophobic hallways of a sunken vessel, while multi-legged eldritch abominations hunt you from the shadows. 

Lighthouse: Ascend this soaring tower while fending off the relentless attacks of the Queen’s Guardians and outrunning the hungry flames rising from below.  

The Crown: Try to get off this cursed island by lighting the beacon at the lighthouse summit. However, your past won’t let you go without a fight... 

This DLC also gives you the usual extras:
- 9 new weapons, including a throwable shark, a trident and a pirate hook hand (eyepatch not included) 
- a not-so-cute pet
- loads of outfits
- new enemies to bash

70050000030111.name: Surviving the Aftermath: Founder's Pack
70050000030111.description:
The Founder’s Pack grants early supporters of Surviving the Aftermath the following items:

Pathfinder Statue
Get access to this magnificent buildable statue that pays tribute to the founders of your colony. 

Pathfinder Flags
Increase the customization options of your colony by getting access exclusive Pathfinder Flag Symbols.

70050000030124.name: Bunny Ear Headband - Accessory
70050000030124.intro: Your big, long ears will be the center of attention!
70050000030124.description:
The Head Accessory for Ao "Bunny Ear Headband" is added.

Note: After unlocking the Change Outfit function for the poolside "Locker Room", you can change into the accessory from the lockers inside the "Locker Room".

Note: This is a Limited Time Bonus for free download. Until November 22nd, 2021.

70050000030127.name: Hoshinomiya Extreme Makeover Swimsuit - Costume Set
70050000030127.intro: The popular costume from the previous game is back!
70050000030127.description:
A "Hoshinomiya Extreme Makeover Swimsuit" costume is added for Kokoro, Rena, Yuki, Shiho, Hinako, Kirara, Hiori, Mio, and Uta, for a total of 9 varieties.

Note: After unlocking the Change Outfit function for the poolside "Locker Room", you can change into the costumes from the lockers inside the "Locker Room". (The corresponding girl must also be one of your friends.)
Note: For details about content, please visit the official site.
Note: This product is a DLC set product for those who purchased the "BLUE REFLECTION: Second Light Digital Deluxe Edition" or "BLUE REFLECTION: Second Light Ultimate Edition".

70050000030130.name: Uniform Alt. Color - Costume Set
70050000030130.intro: Wear a new uniform to give some flare to your school life!
70050000030130.description:

Note: After unlocking the Change Outfit function for the poolside "Locker Room", you can change into the costumes from the lockers inside the "Locker Room". (The corresponding girl must also be one of your friends.)

Note: This product is a DLC set product for those who purchased the "BLUE REFLECTION: Second Light Digital Deluxe Edition" or "BLUE REFLECTION: Second Light Ultimate Edition".

70050000030132.name: Extreme School Makeover Kit
70050000030132.intro: Give your school life a complete overhaul!
70050000030132.description:
The school development facilities "Beach Chair (Extreme Makeover)" and "Animal Rides (Extreme Makeover)" are added.

Note: The facilities can be used after unlocking School Development at the Work Room.
Note: For details about content, please visit the official site.
Note: This product is a DLC set product for those who purchased the "BLUE REFLECTION: Second Light Digital Deluxe Edition" or "BLUE REFLECTION: Second Light Ultimate Edition".

70050000030134.name: Jump Start Fragment Set
70050000030134.intro: Give yourself tactical advantages in the early portions of the game!
70050000030134.description:
The Fragments "Warm Guidance", "Silent Support", and "Reaching Prayer" are added.

Note: The Fragments can be used after the Main Menu option Fragments is unlocked.
Note: For details about content, please visit the official site.
Note: This product is a DLC set product for those who purchased the "BLUE REFLECTION: Second Light Digital Deluxe Edition" or "BLUE REFLECTION: Second Light Ultimate Edition".

70050000030138.name: Special Photo Frame - Bulletin Board
70050000030138.intro: Display your fondest memories on a bulletin board!
70050000030138.description:
The Photo Frame "Bulletin Board" is added.

Note: The content can be used in Photo Mode.
Note: For details about content, please visit the official site.
Note: This product is a DLC set product for those who purchased the "BLUE REFLECTION: Second Light Digital Deluxe Edition" or "BLUE REFLECTION: Second Light Ultimate Edition".

70050000030140.name: Sunflower Headband & Summer Sunglasses
70050000030140.description:
The accessories "Sunflower Headband" and "Summer Sunglasses" are added.

Note: After unlocking the Change Outfit function for the poolside "Locker Room", you can change into the accessories from the lockers inside the "Locker Room".

70050000030152.name: Hoshinomiya Uniform - Costume Set
70050000030152.intro: Explore the mysterious world wearing matching uniforms!
70050000030152.description:
A "Hoshinomiya Uniform" costume based on the uniform of Hinako, the main character of "BLUE REFLECTION", is added for Ao, Kokoro, Rena, Yuki, Shiho, Kirara, Hiori, Mio, and Uta, for a total of 9 varieties.

Note: This product is a DLC set product for those who purchased the "BLUE REFLECTION: Second Light Ultimate Edition" or "BLUE REFLECTION: Second Light Season Pass".

70050000030156.intro: A kitty that wishes to serve her master!
70050000030156.description:

Note: After unlocking the Change Outfit function for the poolside "Locker Room", you can change into the costumes from the lockers inside the "Locker Room". 

Note: For details about content, please visit the official site.

In addition, the "BLUE REFLECTION: Second Light Ultimate Edition", which includes the "BLUE REFLECTION: Second Light Season Pass", is also available. Be careful to avoid making a redundant purchase.

70050000030164.intro: Kitties that wish to serve their master!

70050000030168.name: Crafting Function - Ether Synthesis
70050000030168.description:
Adds "Ether Synthesis", a crafting function that allows you to consume multiple materials in exchange for different materials.

Note: To enjoy using the content, you must advance the game to a certain extent.

Note: For details about content, please visit the official site.
Note: This content is part of the "BLUE REFLECTION: Second Light Season Pass". 
In addition, the "BLUE REFLECTION: Second Light Ultimate Edition", which includes the "BLUE REFLECTION: Second Light Season Pass", is also available. Be careful to avoid making a redundant purchase.

70050000030170.name: Additional Map - Hidden Southern Island
70050000030170.intro: On a southern island befitting paradise, a new adventure begins!
70050000030170.description:
Adds a new island map, as well as a corresponding event.

■Story
Ao and the girls were cheerfully chatting on the rooftop of the school, when suddenly they noticed they could see an island in the distance.
When on earth had it appeared there...? There was nothing like that there before...
Ao and the girls made a small boat and rode it to the island, where they discovered a spacious paradise with a white sandy beach!
They decided they would start having fun right away, but then a mysterious girl appeared in the shadows...
A new adventure on a dazzling southern island is about to begin!

Note: The added event does not include any voice-overs.
Note: To enjoy using the content, you must advance the game to a certain extent.

70050000030185.intro: As the girls recall memories, they encounter a certain alchemist...
70050000030185.description:

■Story
One day, the Heartscape of someone unknown to Ao and the girls suddenly appears before them.
Nervous, yet curious, the girls venture inside, only to discover the scattered memories of a certain female alchemist.
By exploring her memories, just what can Ao and the girls gain...?

70050000030666.name: Zorya: The Celestial Sisters ™ (Full Game)
70050000030666.intro: Play along with a friend as either Aysu or Solveig and help reunite the sister goddesses. Use caution and safely navigate the shadows to solve the increasingly complex puzzles.
70050000030666.description:
This DLC unlocks the full version of the game Zorya: The Celestial Sisters.
An award-winning cooperative puzzle game that takes place in a desolate world where the sun never sets. Choose to play as one of two sisters: Aysu, the night goddess who must stay within the shadows and can summon Wind Power, or Solveig, the all-powerful sun goddess who controls time and can harness Solar Energy. To succeed in the game, players must reunite the sisters by safely navigating the shadows to solve increasingly complex puzzles and restore balance to the world.

70050000030669.name: Animal Crossing™: New Horizons - Happy Home Paradise
70050000030669.intro: Expand your horizons and help create vacation homes for clients on all-new resort islands
70050000030669.description:
Join Lottie’s Paradise Planning team and travel to a distant group of beautiful resort islands with a diverse set of landscapes. This time, you are in charge of inviting characters as clients and helping them live out their own dream vacations. Choose from a variety of islands, with different terrain and climates and find one that matches your client’s vision. Then start designing and start making their vacation dreams come true. Just wait until you see the look on your clients’ faces after you reveal the vacation home decorated just for them.

Add personalized touches to your client’s resort island

Customize everything from home exteriors and interiors, the yard and even customize the weather to either be sunny or rainy. Handpick the picture-book spot for your resort creation and use the Paradise Planning team’s expansive inventory to deck out vacation homes without being limited to your own inventory, recipes, or resources. The editing tools make decorating a snap! It’s a breeze to go back and redecorate as you like, so change and rearrange to your heart’s content.  

As you design more vacation homes for your clients, facilities like a café and a school around the Paradise Planning office will open up. Decorate these into inviting locales, choose roles for different characters, then watch your clients spend time together. Why not stop by and check in to see how things are going in paradise?

You can up your design game on your own island, too! Design options that you acquire while working as a Paradise Planning team member can be used on your island as they become available. Build partition walls and pillars, set the mood with lighting, and add soundscapes to both your residents’ homes as well as your own.

Share your masterpieces with friends

Take in-game photos of your designs and add them to your portfolio. Share the photos with other players using the in-game Showroom* in the Happy Home Network app and they can tour your personally-designed resort islands or go tour theirs for some relaxation and inspiration.

70050000030759.description:
Adds the difficulty "Safety," suggested for beginners or those who want to enjoy the story.

*You can select this difficulty not only at the start of the game, but also mid-game from the Options menu.

70050000030760.name: Mitama Dance of Wealth
70050000030760.description:
Increases the spawn rate of "Saki Mitama," demons that drop items that can be sold for Macca.

*There is still a low chance of Mitama spawning even without this DLC.
*You can revert the spawn rate mid-game from the Options menu.

70050000030761.name: Mitama Dance of EXP
70050000030761.description:
Increases the spawn rate of "Kushi Mitama," demons that drop items that give the protagonist EXP, and "Ara Mitama," demons that drop items that give ally demons EXP.

*There is still a low chance of Mitama spawning even without this DLC.
*You can revert the spawn rate mid-game from the Options menu.

70050000030762.name: Mitama Dance of Miracles
70050000030762.description:
Increases the spawn rate of "Nigi Mitama," demons that drop items that give the protagonist Glory, points needed to learn new Miracles.

*There is still a low chance of Mitama spawning even without this DLC.
*You can revert the spawn rate mid-game from the Options menu.

70050000030763.name: A Goddess in Training
70050000030763.description:
Grants access to the subquest "A Goddess in Training." In this quest, players will be able to take on "Megami Artemis," and even recruit her should they prove victorious.

*After progressing to a certain point in the game, talk to the Bethel researcher in the Tokyo Diet Building to begin the subquest. Once completed, you will have the option of fighting Artemis as many times as you want.
*It is recommended that this subquest be attempted at least halfway through the game.

70050000030764.name: The Rage of a Queen
70050000030764.description:
Grants access to the subquest "The Rage of a Queen". In this quest, players will be able to take on "Femme Cleopatra," and even recruit her should they prove victorious.

*After progressing to a certain point in the game, talk to the Bethel researcher in the Tokyo Diet Building to begin the subquest. Once completed, you will have the option of fighting Cleopatra as many times as you want.
*It is recommended that this subquest be attempted near the end of the game.

70050000030765.name: The Doctor's Last Wish
70050000030765.description:
Grants access to the subquest "The Doctor's Last Wish". In this quest, players will be able to take on "Tyrant Mephisto," and even recruit him should they prove victorious.

*After progressing to a certain point in the game, talk to the Bethel researcher in the Tokyo Diet Building to begin the subquest. Once completed, you will have the option of fighting Mephisto as many times as you want.
*It is recommended that this subquest be attempted near the end of the game.

70050000030766.name: Return of the True Demon
70050000030766.description:
Grants access to the subquest "Return of the True Demon". In this quest, players will be able to take on and recruit the legendary nine Fiends: Matador, Daisoujou, Hell Biker, White Rider, Red Rider, Black Rider, Pale Rider, Mother Harlot, and Trumpeter. The challenge doesn't stop there, however, for upon defeating the fiends, players will then be able to challenge the strongest opponent of them all: the Demi-fiend.

*After progressing to a certain point in the game, you will then be able to begin the subquest when visiting the World of Shadows.
*The Fiends will make their appearances as you progress through the story.
*Once completed, you will not be able to fight the Fiends again, but you will have the option of fighting the Demi-fiend as many times as you want.
*Note that you cannot recruit the Demi-fiend.
*It is recommended that challenging the Fiends be attempted at sometime halfway through the game. Challenging the Demi-fiend is best attempted in the post-game.

*This option can only be toggled from the title screen.

70050000030776.name: Just Dance 2022 - 90 Days
70050000030776.description:
Play the best of Just Dance with Just Dance Unlimited – your dance-on-demand streaming service! 

Just Dance Unlimited is an online streaming service that grants you access to a catalog of more than 600 tracks playable via Just Dance 2021 and more than 400 tracks playable via Just Dance 2020 and Just Dance 2019, for the duration of your subscription.
Not compatible with Just Dance 2016, Just Dance 2017 or Just Dance 2018.  
Just Dance Unlimited requires permanent internet access, the creation and connection to a Ubisoft Connect account, the acceptance of respective Terms & Conditions and the payment of a subscription fee. Cancel anytime. Age and territorial restrictions may apply. More details at https://support.ubisoft.com/Faqs/000025458.

70050000030964.name: Additional Characters "Gothic wa Mahou Otome" 5 Characters Set
70050000030964.intro: Deathsmiles meets Gothic wa Mahou Otome
70050000030964.description:
Characters from "Gothic wa Mahou Otome -Contract with me, right away!-", another shoot 'em up game that shares the same world-view as Deathsmiles, are joining the fray!
Now you can use any of the five characters known as the "5 Otome" (Ranun, Cattleya, Souffle, Plumeria, Rosalie) as a player unit in Deathsmiles*.

*The "Additional Characters Gothic wa Mahou Otome - 5 Characters Set" DLC can be used in the Ver 1.1 and Normal modes of Deathsmiles and Deathsmiles Mega Black Label included in the main product.

Each of the five additional player characters have unique abilities that will allow for deeper gameplay and strategizing. Other additional content includes new voices, demo scenes, and remixed BGMs.
A brand-new Deathsmiles experience awaits!

• DLC contents
-Additional character: Ranun
-Additional character: Cattleya
-Additional character: Souffle
-Additional character: Plumeria
-Additional character: Rosalie
-Gothic wa Mahou Otome original BGM
-Gothic wa Mahou Otome "Deathsmiles Respect Arrange" BGM

• How to install the DLC
Press the Switch DLC button on Deathsmiles' mode selection screen to switch to the DLC version of the corresponding mode.
To change BGM, go to the Options menu and select Sound. You can change the BGM for all stages at once or configure them for individual stages.

70050000031082.name: Healing Kit (1)
70050000031082.description:
[Notice]
This DLC contains the exact same set of items as Healing Kit (2) and Healing Kit (3). Please be sure you check what you're purchasing beforehand to avoid the unintentional purchase of duplicate items.

A set of recovery items to help on your adventure.
Set includes:
Green Potion (HP Recovery) x20
Emerald Potion (Full HP Recovery) x10
Shining Pot (HP Regen) x10
Skyblue Meds (SP Recovery) x10
Lapis Elixir (Full SP Recovery) x5
Demovita RE (Increases DG) x10
Multiplum (Cures all Status Conditions) x20

*As mentioned above, this DLC contains a set of items identical to the set contained within Healing Kit (2) and Healing Kit (3), but you can purchase all three to gain more of these items.
*Any purchased items that cause you to exceed the maximum held amount (99) within your save file will be lost.

70050000031216.intro:
[Early Bird Purchase Bonus]
Healing Wand and Armor Gem Assortment Set
70050000031216.description:
This set includes a healing wand to help new players in the early stages of the game, as well as armor gems to use in a pinch or when the time comes to upgrade your armor. The right equipment will make your journey much easier!

The following items are included:
-Unnamed Gem x4
-Shield Gem x3
-Hat Gem x3
-Helmet Gem x3
-Light Armor Gem x3
-Heavy Armor Gem ×3
-Inner Gem ×3
-Accessory Gem ×3
-Healing Staff (Weapon) x 1

*DLC items can be obtained by entering your room on the second floor of the Dragon Inn after downloading the game.

70050000031217.intro:
New Job Category: Machina!
Tons of Fun! Perfect Gem Set
70050000031217.description:
The Perfect Gem Set contains 333 in-game items, including artifacts required for the new job type, Machina, and a total of 25 kinds of gems (each gem type, as well as other jewels used as currency).

The following items are included:
<Rare Gems>
　Divine Weapon Gem x5
　Gold Gem x5 / Silver Gem x10 / Copper Gem x15
　Incremental Gem x10 / Intensification Gem x5 / Enhancement Gem x10
＜Weapon and Equipment Gems>
　Unnamed Gem ×20
　Sword Gem ×20 / Blade Gem ×20 / Heavy Weapon Gem ×20
　Long Staff Gem ×20
　Special Gem ×20 / Staff Gem ×20 / Bow Gem ×20
　Shield Gem x15 / Hat Gem x15 / Helmet Gem x15
　Light Armor Gem ×15 / Heavy Armor Gem ×15 / Inner Gem ×15
　Accessory Gem x15
＜Currency Jewels>
　Large Gem ×1
　Small Gem x2
　Gemstone x5

*DLC items can be obtained by entering your room on the second floor of the Dragon Inn after downloading the game.

70050000031218.description:

*The purchase of this product is limited to once per account. Please note that multiple purchases are not possible.

-Artifact Gem x20

*The purchase of this product is limited to once per account. Please note that multiple purchases are not possible.

70050000031296.name: The Binding of Isaac: Repentance
70050000031296.description:
PRAY FOR REPENTANCE AND BE REBORN

Experience the modern classic, The Binding of Isaac, like you've never seen it before. It's a game too big to be called a sequel: Repentance takes Isaac to new heights of roguelike dungeon adventure, as the brave boy descends into the basement for his greatest challenge yet! Isaac's new quest takes him to unknown places he's never been, filled with horrible new enemies and bosses, weapon combos you've never synergized before and items he's never seen... unholy terrors from his wildest dreams and worst nightmares!


BIGGER THAN A SEQUEL

The Binding of Isaac: Repentance is so huge, so new and so feature-packed that it makes previous updates look like prequels. There are more features, improvements and new secrets, too many secrets, than most games would include in an official sequel! It's an immense amount of new content to explore, even if you're at 1,000,000%!


THE "FINAL" UPDATE TO THE AWARD-WINNING CLASSIC

The Binding of Isaac: Repentance features hundreds of new features and quality-of-life improvements. It’s the ultimate edition of the genre-defining roguelike, now with OVER 500 HOURS of new gameplay!

KEY FEATURES:
- 130+ new items (more than 700 items in total)
- A full alternate path with brand new chapters and a new final boss and ending
- 100+ new enemies
- 25+ new bosses
- 2 new playable characters
- 5 new challenges
- 100+ new achievements
- 5,000+ new room designs

70050000031345.name: Asphalt 9: Legends – British Pack
70050000031345.description:
The British Season is here! 
Feel the power of British racing with this limited-time DLC. Unlock the Aston Martin DB11, the Jaguar F-Type SVR and the Ginetta G60, plus a load of resources to accelerate & boost your drive to the top!

This pack contains:
- 30 blueprints to unlock the Aston Martin DB11
- 30 blueprints to unlock the Jaguar F-Type SVR
- 30 blueprints to unlock the Ginetta G60
- 500,000 Credits
- 500 Tokens

70050000031357.name: Life is Strange: True Colors - Alex Outfit Pack
70050000031357.description:
Expand your wardrobe with four exclusive outfits for Alex, with unique designs that celebrate Valkyrie, the feline fury of the record store, and the other cats of Haven Springs. 

The Alex Outfit Pack adds 1 optional outfit to your wardrobe in each of the first four chapters.

CHAPTER 1 – CURIOSITY IN RED
Catch a glimpse of a black cat peeking out from Alex’s dark denim jacket.

CHAPTER 2 – HIT THE DECKS
This grey cat gets all paws to the dance floor with an unforgettable remix.

CHAPTER 3 – HISS-STORY REPEATING
Commemorate Valkyrie’s ‘charming’ personality with this allover print shirt.

CHAPTER 4 – PURPLE POCKET
Feeling lucky? Increase your charm with a pop of purple and a hint of cat.

This content requires the base game Life is Strange: True Colors in order to play.

This content will be available to purchase after the release of Life is Strange: True Colors.

70050000031358.name: Life is Strange: True Colors - Life is Strange Hero Outfit Pack
70050000031358.description:
Change up Alex's look with 4 new outfits inspired by past Life is Strange protagonists. 

The pack includes clothing inspired by Chloe’s Misfit Skull, Sean’s Wolf Squad, Daniel’s Space Mission, and Max’s Jane Doe outfits.

The Life is Strange Hero Outfit Pack adds 1 optional outfit to your wardrobe in each of the first four chapters.

CHAPTER 1 – MISFIT SKULL
Indulge your punk rebellion with this outfit inspired by Chloe’s iconic ensemble from Life is Strange.

CHAPTER 2 – WOLF SQUAD
Howl at the moon with this sweater based on Sean’s characterful hoodie from Life is Strange 2.

CHAPTER 3 – SPACE MISSION
Blast off with this chic shirt incorporating Daniel’s unforgettable rocket from Life is Strange 2. 

CHAPTER 4 – JANE DOE
Get dressed to the nines to solve crimes, with this t-shirt of Max’s classic Jane Doe design from Life is Strange.

This content requires the base game Life is Strange: True Colors in order to play.

The Life is Strange Hero Outfit Pack is only available as part of the Deluxe Upgrade, Deluxe Edition, or Ultimate Edition. It is not available separately.

70050000031359.name: Life is Strange: Wavelengths
70050000031359.description:
Play as Steph Gingrich in the year before Alex came to Haven Springs, in an exclusive standalone story set in the iconic Rocky Mountain Record Traders store and KRCT radio station. Spin records, host a radio show, and face your future. 

Step into Steph's booth as the all-new radio show host for KRCT: Haven's best - and only - radio station. Over four seasons, discover more about Steph's past and her relationships as she makes her mark on the record store, uncovers its secrets – and decides her future.

LIVE ON AIR
You're the DJ: choose records for the playlist, 'ad lib' your way through local commercials, and help Steph compose an own original song. 

ROLL THE DICE
Give D20-powered advice to callers with problems both serious and mundane, GM a tabletop RPG, and reach out to reconnect with an old friend.

SMALL TOWN PRIDE
Swipe left or right on Steph's dating app matches, and join Steph as she reminisces about formative Prides past.

A ROOM OF HER OWN
See the record store change over the seasons as Steph asserts her personality, and discover its hidden history and surprising spaces as you explore.

ALL-NEW SOUNDTRACK
Hits from Girl in Red, Alt-J, Portugal, The Man, Foals, Hayley Kiyoko, Maribou State, and more set the tone for Steph's journey, each packing an emotional punch.

This content requires the base game Life is Strange: True Colors in order to play.

Wavelengths is included with the Deluxe Edition and the Ultimate Edition.

If you have the boxed game or the Standard Edition, you can purchase the Deluxe Upgrade to gain access to Wavelengths. The Deluxe Upgrade contains both Wavelengths and the Life is Strange Hero Outfit Pack.

Wavelengths is not available for standalone or separate purchase: only as part of the Deluxe Upgrade, Deluxe Edition, or Ultimate Edition.

70050000031630.name: Monster Camp Character Pack - New Blood
70050000031630.intro: ADD EVEN MORE GORGEOUS MONSTERS TO THE PLAYABLE CHARACTER ROSTER!
70050000031630.description:
We all love the original color crew. But it’s time to spice things up… by bringing you 4 new options for playable characters.
Let us introduce the 4 characters you will unlock by acquiring the “New Blood” Character Pack DLC:

Sawyer may be your choice if you’re more of an introvert who enjoys a little peace and quiet.

Abdu is super chill and may be the perfect choice if you just want to go with the flow.

Susanne brings a loud, electrifying personality that lets you go full badass.

And Noodles… is just Noodles. Pure, unadulterated derp energy.

Now you will have more ways to answer the age-old question: WHO ARE YOU?

70050000031631.name: Monster Camp Character Pack - Zoe
70050000031631.intro: PLAY AS EVERYONE’S FAVORITE ELDRITCH CUTIE!
70050000031631.description:
We all love Zoe, don't we?

She's passionate about her interests. She's excited 24/7. She's a lover of many fandoms, always writing a fanfic or drawing fanart. 
She's snarky, chaotic, and ultimately good-hearted. She's more than ready to explore her own truth and be unapologetically herself.
We love her partly because she's like us. We love her partly because she's what we'd like to be.

That's the charm of our beloved and adorkable eldritch cutie.
In a way, she IS us.
So maybe... today we can be her.

- Olias: Capped Captain – New

Please visit the official website for more information. 
This DLC is only available to users who have purchased "Atelier Sophie 2: The Alchemist of the Mysterious Dream Digital Deluxe Edition" or "Atelier Sophie 2: The Alchemist of the Mysterious Dream Ultimate Edition".

70050000032211.name: Useful Weapons Set
70050000032211.intro: Best weapons for the early game!
70050000032211.description:

Featured items:
- Sophie: Starguide Staff
- Plachta: Trick Hand
- Ramizel: Rune Scepter
- Alette: Long Boots
- Olias: Hunting Rifle
- Diebold: Twin Blades

Note: The DLC items can be obtained from the Container in the atelier.
Weapons can only be used after you progressed the game to the point where you can change your equipment.
Please visit the official website for more information. 
This DLC is only available to users who have purchased "Atelier Sophie 2: The Alchemist of the Mysterious Dream Digital Deluxe Edition" or "Atelier Sophie 2: The Alchemist of the Mysterious Dream Ultimate Edition".

70050000032213.name: Useful Items Set
70050000032213.intro: Handy items for the early game!
70050000032213.description:

Featured items:
- Reflection Talisman
- Carapace Talisman
- Healing Talisman
- Traveler's Shoes (exploration equipment that increases movement speed)
- Victor's Charm (increases the amount of Cole earned after a battle by 4%)
- Training Charm (increases the amount of EXP gained after a battle by 10%)

Note: The DLC items can be obtained from the Container in the atelier.
Talismans can only be used after you progressed the game to the point where you can change your equipment.
Please visit the official website for more information.
This DLC is only available to users who have purchased "Atelier Sophie 2: The Alchemist of the Mysterious Dream Digital Deluxe Edition" or "Atelier Sophie 2: The Alchemist of the Mysterious Dream Ultimate Edition".

70050000032249.name: Extra Scenario/Area "Atelier Plachta"
70050000032249.description:
