Note: This item is planned to be released before the end of May 2022. 

Note: After you clear this story, the area and items added with this DLC will be added to the main game.
The additional story features Japanese voice-over.
This content will appear on the title screen after it is installed.
Please visit the official website for more information. 
This item is included in the "Atelier Sophie 2 Season Pass". Please avoid making redundant purchases.

70050000032321.name: MLB® The Show™ 22 Digital Deluxe Bonus Content
70050000032321.description: The Digital Deluxe Edition Bonus Content grants you 1 Diamond Choice pack, 1 Cover Athlete Diamond Choice pack, 5 Gold Choice packs, 20 The Show packs, 1 Ballplayer pack, Double daily login rewards, 1 Cover Athlete Themed Bat Skin, and 25K Stubs™ for MLB® The Show™ 22.

70050000032322.name: LEGO® Star Wars™: The Mandalorian Season 1 Character Pack
70050000032322.description:
This is the Way.  Play as the iconic characters from the hit series The Mandalorian Season 1.  Travel around the galaxy as The Mandalorian protecting Grogu at all costs. The character pack includes:
- The Mandalorian 
- Cara Dune
- Greef Karga
- IG-11 
- Kuiil

70050000032323.name: LEGO® Star Wars™: Solo: A Star Wars Story Character Pack
70050000032323.description:
Experience the galaxy with the characters from the prequel "Solo: A Star Wars Story." Play as the young scoundrels and blast your way through the epic saga. The character pack includes:
- Han Solo (Young)
- Chewbacca (Young)
- Lando (Young)
- Qi'ra
- Tobias Beckett
- Enfys Nest

70050000032324.name: LEGO® Star Wars™: The Skywalker Saga Classic Character Pack
70050000032324.description: Play as the classic LEGO variants of Luke, Leia, Han, Lando and Darth Vader in LEGO® Star Wars™: The Skywalker Saga. Explore the galaxy as iconic characters based on the original LEGO® minifigures from 1999.

70050000032325.name: LEGO® Star Wars™: Rogue One: A Star Wars Story Character Pack
70050000032325.description:
It takes an unlikely band of heroes to save the rebellion.  With their blasters, a staff, a heavy repeater cannon, and more, these heroes (and a villain) are ready for battle. The character pack includes:   
- Jyn Erso 
- Cassian Andor
- Baze Malbus 
- Bodhi Rook
- Chirrut Îmwe
- Director Krennic
- K-2SO

70050000032326.name: LEGO® Star Wars™: The Bad Batch Character Pack
70050000032326.description:
Be a clone unlike any other.  The elite Clone Force 99, also known as The Bad Batch, each have their own exceptional skills making them a formidable crew. The character pack includes:  
- Hunter
- Echo
- Wrecker
- Tech
- Crosshair

70050000032327.name: LEGO® Star Wars™: The Mandalorian Season 2 Character Pack
70050000032327.description:
Get into more action with the fan-favorite characters from Season 2 of the hit series "The Mandalorian." Play as Ahsoka Tano, Anakin Skywalker's former padawan with her dual lightsabers, and Boba Fett with his recovered armor.  The character pack includes:  
- Ahsoka Tano 
- Bo-Katan Kryze
- Boba Fett (Re-armored)
- Fennec Shand
- Moff Gideon

70050000032329.name: LEGO® Star Wars™: The Skywalker Saga Trooper Pack
70050000032329.description:
Play as the soldiers of the Empire from Rogue One: A Star Wars Story, Solo: A Star Wars Story, and The Mandalorian. 
- Imperial Death Trooper 
- Incinerator Stormtrooper 
- Range Trooper 
- Imperial Shoretrooper 
- Mimban Stormtrooper

70050000032551.name: "Felyne Stealth Hood" Hunter layered armor piece
70050000032551.intro: Hunt in style with this special layered armor!
70050000032551.description:
Hunt in style with this special layered armor!

After purchasing, speak to the Courier and select Add-on Content to receive the content. You will then be able to use it in the Layered Armor Settings menu of the Item Box.

Note: This item is cosmetic only and does not confer any status benefits.

70050000032552.name: "Pretty Present" Cohoot outfit
70050000032552.intro: Dress up your Cohoot pet with this special outfit!
70050000032552.description:
Dress up your Cohoot pet with this special outfit!

After purchasing, speak to the Courier and select Add-on Content to receive the content. You will then be able to use it in the Change Clothes section of the Pet menu.

Note: This item is cosmetic only and does not confer any status benefits.

70050000032553.name: "Special Stickers 8" sticker set
70050000032553.intro:
Cohoots are so cute! Too cute? Hoot, hoot!
Have fun communicating with other players using stickers!
70050000032553.description:
Have fun communicating with other players using stickers!

This add-on contains:

"Special Stickers 8" sticker set
Cohoots are so cute! Too cute? Hoot, hoot!

After purchasing, speak to the Courier and select Add-on Content to receive the content. You will then be able to use it in the Chat menu.

70050000032587.name: Monster Hunter Rise: Sunbreak
70050000032587.description:
The world of Monster Hunter Rise gets bigger and deeper with this massive expansion featuring new monsters, new locales and more!

Note: You must own Monster Hunter Rise in order to play this expansion. Sunbreak content is accessible after completion of the 7-star Hub quest “Serpent Goddess of Thunder”.

Support for Korean, Simplified Chinese and Traditional Chinese will be added via update scheduled for release on 30/6/2022.

70050000032598.name: Monster Hunter Rise: Sunbreak Deluxe Kit
70050000032598.intro: Enjoy a bundle of great additional content!
70050000032598.description:
Enjoy a bundle of great additional content:

• "Dragonsbane" hunter layered armor set
• "C Hound" Palamute layered armor set
• "F Devout" Palico layered armor set
• "Take Aim" gesture set (4 gestures)
• Fight Pose Set (3 poses)
• "Elegant Eyes" makeup
• "Fluffy Curls" hairstyle

Note: Layered armor is a "skin" which changes the appearance of the character without affecting their stats and abilities. The additional content included in this Deluxe Kit is the same as that included in the Deluxe Edition. Monster Hunter Rise required; can be used without purchasing Monster Hunter Rise: Sunbreak.

70050000032638.name: Deluxe Up Grade Kit
70050000032638.intro: Introducing DLC that includes three-player Mahjong, three-player Hanafuda, Shisen Mahjong Solitaire, and additional Shogi problems.
70050000032638.description: Try your hand at different ways to play in this downloadable set available for a special price! This set includes the  popular three-player Mahjong (Standard/Kansai/Kyoto rule sets), the fun and exciting 3-player Hanafuda, brain-crunching Shisen Mahjong Solitaire, 500 one-move Shogi problems, and 150 three-move Shogi problems.

70050000032670.name: VOCALOID Pack 6
70050000032670.intro: A new pack featuring 10 Vocaloid songs, navigators, and avatars!
70050000032670.description:
A DLC pack for GROOVE COASTER WAI WAI PARTY!!!! that includes 10 Vocaloid songs, navigators, and avatars!

This pack includes the following content.
■Song Pack (10 songs)
・Kokoro / Toraboruta
・Double Lariat / Ago Aniki
・Ametokusari / otetsu
・Crazy ∞ nighT / Hitoshizuku×Yama△
・Dreamin Chuchu / emon
・Positive Dance Time / konoshita
・Good-Bye Declaration / Chinozo
・The Vampire / DECO*27
・Groove Groove melo-melody♪ / konoshita
・???(Secret)

■Navigator
・Luka Megurine *with voice
・Una Otomachi(GuruGuru) *with voice
・Rin Kagamine(GuruGuru) *with voice

■Avatar
・LUKA MEGURINE(V4X, 2D)
・Una Otomachi(Positive, 2D)
・RIN KAGAMINE(Positive, 2D)
・Una Otomachi(Guruguru, 2D)
・RIN KAGAMINE(Guruguru, 2D)

*Some content will be unlocked via missions after downloading.

70050000032698.name: SOL CRESTA Dramatic DLC
70050000032698.intro: Experience another mode that unravels the mysteries of SOL CRESTA!
70050000032698.description:
Stand up, Sol Cresta, and take back the sun from the clutches of evil! The galaxy-sized SOL CRESTA Dramatic Mode has docked!

In SOL CRESTA's new Dramatic Mode, you'll unlock the secrets gone untold during Arcade Mode, like the true identity of the mysterious rival ship, the true motivations behind Mega Zofer's conquest of the solar system, and the hidden pasts of Yamato pilots Sho, Luna, and Dril. Watch them grow and mature during their desparate struggle against a universal evil, and see their true potential unleashed in this robust and lovingly crafted tale!

A Story That's Ready to Go Supernoval with Excitement!
・A parade of unique and expressive characters
・A story penned by Hideki Kamiya, the force behind Bayonetta and The Wonderful 101
・A dense Database filled with images of and information about every friendly and enemy character, ship, and device
・The continuation of the Cresta saga began with 80s classics Moon Cresta and Terra Cresta
・A story that unfolds differently from Arcade Mode, with a true ending that awaits the truly bold!

70050000032706.name: Touhou Eurobeat Pack Vol.2
70050000032706.intro: Vol. 2 of the popular "Touhou Eurobeat Pack" is here!
70050000032706.description:
The Touhou Eurobeat Pack was so popular last time, we've released a Volume 2! Enjoy a collection of Euro remixes that hold their own against Vol. 1!
The new artists for this volume include 3L's NJK Record
and chocofan, famous for their superfast Kouryuudou arrangements.

Pack contains the following:

■6 Songs
・No Life Queen [DJ Command Remix]
　 / SOUND HOLIC Vs. Eurobeat Union feat. Nana Takahashi
・Bloody Knife / A-One
・YORU NO KAZAGURUMA / CrazyBeats feat. HaNaTaN
・SUMMER ENERGY / Eurobeat Union feat. Aki(Honey Pocket)
・LUCKY CAT / chocofan
・Spring of Dreams / NJK Record

■6 Challenge Stages
・Lv5 Ice Fairy Waits For Springtime (Spring of Dreams)
・Lv6 Business is Booming! (LUCKY CAT)
・Lv7 Round-n-Round! (YORU NO KAZAGURUMA)
・Lv8 Gensokyo's Delicate Flowers (SUMMER ENERGY)
・Lv9 Go Home Shrine maiden
　(No Life Queen [DJ Command Remix])
・Lv10 Bloody Training!? (Bloody Knife)

* Internet connection required for purchase.
* Game must be restarted after songs are purchased in order to use them.

70050000032724.name: Sushi Time! Expansion Pack #1

It's Sushi Time!
Create the most amazing sushi bar in your town!
70050000032724.description:

Go ahead, test your skill!

70050000032732.intro: Change the outfit of your character with the "Rune Factory 4 Marriage Candidates Outfit Set"
70050000032732.description: Dress up as your favorite character from the much-loved Rune Factory 4, with 13 additional outfits to wear in Rune Factory 5!

70050000032735.name: Ziggurat 2 - Supporter Pack
70050000032735.description:
This pack for Ziggurat 2 includes 4 weapons unlocked right away.
New wand: Wand of the Covenant

New alchemic weapon: Incarnation of Pain

70050000032736.name: DRAGON BALL FIGHTERZ - Android 21 (Lab Coat)
70050000032736.description:
Android 21, an original character from DRAGON BALL FighterZ, now joins the fight in her appearance before transformation!

This content includes:
• Android 21 (Lab Coat) as a new playable character
• 5 alternative colors for her outfit
• Android 21 (Lab Coat) Lobby Avatar
